looping/1.png.title: Looping
looping/1.png.description: Turn on loop for any track and it will repeat indefinitely, with no recommendations or auto-generated queues.

easy-listening/1.png.title: Easy Listening
easy-listening/1.png.description: Manage tracks quickly with swipe gestures: swipe left to queue or edit, and swipe right to delete.

waveform/1.png.title: Live Waveform
waveform/1.png.description: See live waveforms while recording and during playback to make loops and fine adjustments easier.

playlists/1.png.title: Playlists
playlists/1.png.description: Create playlists for sleep, focus, practice, or any routine, and organize your tracks your way.

playlists/2.png.title: Queue & Shuffle
playlists/2.png.description: Queue tracks in the order you choose or shuffle a playlist when you want variety.

recording/1.png.title: Recording
recording/1.png.description: Record your own loops, notes, or ambient sounds and save them as tracks you can play and organize.

ambient/1.png.title: Ambient
ambient/1.png.description: Use white noise or ambient backgrounds to create a calm or focused space.

customization/1.png.title: Themes
customization/1.png.description: Choose from a variety of themes to personalize your listening experience.

customization/2.png.title: Light & Dark
customization/2.png.description: Set one theme for light mode and a different theme for dark mode to follow your device appearance.

customization/3.png.title: Track Details
customization/3.png.description: Adjust titles, descriptions, and thumbnails so tracks are easy to recognize at a glance.

offline/1.png.title: Works Offline
offline/1.png.description: Playback, editing, and recording run directly on your device so you can use the app without internet.

offline/2.png.title: No Account
offline/2.png.description: Use core features without signing in and keep everything tied to your device.

offline/3.png.title: Airplane Mode
offline/3.png.description: Your tracks and playlists stay available even in airplane mode.

backups/1.png.title: Full Backups
backups/1.png.description: Create full backups of your entire music library, including playlists, notes, thumbnails, recordings, and audio files.

backups/2.png.title: Restore Anytime
backups/2.png.description: Import a backup to restore your full library whenever you need to bring everything back.

backups/3.png.title: Save Playlists
backups/3.png.description: Save a specific playlist outside the app when you want to share or archive it separately.

about/1.png.title: Support
about/1.png.description: Contact the developer at humwooter+ostinuto@gmail.com if you need help or have a question.

about/2.png.title: Artist-Made
about/2.png.description: All default artwork and app visuals were created by the developer.

about/3.png.title: Default Audio
about/3.png.description: Default audio tracks were sourced from FreePD (note: FreePD is no longer active).
